column5: Well head out to Scugog today with the wife. NO KIDS! Fishing was slow and the wife started the day off with a nice bucket mouth that shook lose boat side. Rain was not bad and a little chilly, but I toughed it out and I'm glad I did, got my PB 44.5". When I frist felt the hit I tried to set the hook, but it spit it out. I knew it was a muskie but did not know how big since I could not see it. Second cast out, reeling very slow and BANG tried to set the hook but again it would not bite down hard. Now i'm shaking and think it's gone, third cast BANG! I set the hook this time for I almost went backwards into the water. The fight was on and I knew this was BIG, I was shaking and the wife was shaking and see for yourself! Oh by the was like too thank Joonmoon for the muskie tips.
Nice fish! congrats!
Congratulations dizzidevil on your PB Sweet reward for your efforts!!! Thanks for sharing Leechman
awwwwwwwwwwwwsome......wtg..........  nice colours!!!!!!!!!
Nice musky ! Gotta love the anticipation of a big fish that wants your bait. It really gets the blood pumping.
Congrats on your PB. She's a beauty.
Congrats on a nice PB muskie!  Aaron
Nice!  Congrats!
Very nice!  Need to break the ice myself with a musky, maybe scugog is the place to do it!  Awesome fish, congrats on the new PB
Congrats on the PB musky DD. Joonmoon knows his stuff.
Beastlie!
Your gunna need to wash the SLIME off the coat now !!! hahah Congrats ! Nice fish !
Ya got me beat by 1 1/2".   Congrats to ya - plenty of room  left for yet another PB.
awesome musky !  congrats man.  too bad your holding it like a steelhead tho!.  then again.... that release shot is SUPER!
Great job sir!  Thanks for sharing, MTBF
nice fish, great persistence.

Congradulations on your PB Muskie, your chances of beating your 44.5 are great if you put your time on muskies for the next 5 weeks, it is proven that 90 percent of the biggest muskies over 40 lbs are caught in Sept to Nov period but only 10 percent of the fisherman are concentrating on muskies then, I figured the rest must be steelheading then?
nice fish!
nice ski congrats
Congrates on the PB    Awesome fish!  It's not often you get 3 chances at the same fish.
That is a nice musky! Congrats! I was there last night myself trying to catch some wally's at night but it was just too windy from shore
cats out of the bag now, how many times have you said that before?  jeez, I come back to the board and everything has changed hahaha
That musky is nicely coloured and a decent size! Nicely done on getting the PB.
